trans-unit.source: Extends design-time behavior for read/write server controls.
trans-unit.target: Estende o comportamento de tempo de design para controles de servidor de leitura/gravação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner> class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner> classe está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> classe para a funcionalidade de designer de controle equivalente.

trans-unit.source: This control designer provides the ability to drop controls onto the control for this designer.
trans-unit.target: Esse designer de controle fornece a capacidade de soltar os controles para o controle para este designer.

trans-unit.source: Implementers of designers who would like their control to support the addition of child controls should use <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Os implementadores de designers que deseja que seu controle para dar suporte à adição de controles filho deverão usar <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: If you do not want your control to support child controls, use a designer derived from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Se você não desejar que o controle para oferecer suporte a controles filho, usar um designer derivado de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner> class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner> classe está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> classe para a funcionalidade de designer de controle equivalente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o HTML usado para representar o controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: O HTML usado para representar o controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner> class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner> classe está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> classe para a funcionalidade de designer de controle equivalente.

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to map.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade a ser mapeada.

trans-unit.source: The value of the property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Maps a property, including description and value, to an intrinsic HTML style.
trans-unit.target: Mapeia uma propriedade, incluindo a descrição e o valor, para um estilo HTML intrínseco.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A> method is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A> método está obsoleto.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método para a funcionalidade de designer de controle equivalente.

trans-unit.source: this method must be overridden in a derived class to implement the designer.
trans-unit.target: Este método deve ser substituído em uma classe derivada para implementar o designer.

trans-unit.source: Provides notification that is raised when a behavior is attached to the designer.
trans-unit.target: Fornece notificação que é gerada quando um comportamento é anexado ao designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A> method is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A> método está obsoleto.

trans-unit.source: Use the members of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property instead.
trans-unit.target: Use os membros de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade em vez disso.

trans-unit.source: For example, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.SetAttribute%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.GetAttribute%2A> methods on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to map properties to styles.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.SetAttribute%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.GetAttribute%2A> métodos no <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade para mapear propriedades de estilos.

trans-unit.source: The object sending the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que envia o evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs" /> object that provides data for the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs" /> que fornece dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o evento <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged" /> da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner> class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner> classe está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> classe para a funcionalidade de designer de controle equivalente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event occurs after a property has been changed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> evento ocorre depois que uma propriedade foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: This method allows implementers to do any processing that may be needed after a property change.
trans-unit.target: Esse método permite que os implementadores de fazer qualquer processamento que pode ser necessária após uma alteração de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the display of the control.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza a exibição do controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner> class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner> classe está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> classe para a funcionalidade de designer de controle equivalente.
